title: Your Top Ten Labor Day Weekend Food Safety Tips
cleaned_text: Food Safety News Release Wednesday, August 30 2023 Your Top Ten Labor Day Weekend Food Safety Tips Jesus Garcia, Public Affairs Specialist, Food Safety Education Staff When you hit the road for that one last camping trip or beach day, bring food safety along to keep foodborne illness in the rearview mirror. [Here are your Top 10 Labor Day food safety tips for travelers](https://www.usda.gov/media/blog/2023/08/30/your-top-ten-labor-day-weekend-food-safety-tips) Last Updated: Aug 30, 2023
